title: Just a general note to people that play with and against assassins.
body: The aren't low skill, It just takes much much more skill to play against them then it does to play with them. That is why they seem like they are low skill characters, when the assassin is an average player, it takes a literal god to reliably defeat them, lest that player is playing something that is particularly made to counter the assassin, and even then it remains an even lane.

replies.body: It takes no skill to play this game at all. Time to kill is literally so long, there's time to react for every champion that is not a Rengar with ultimate.
